name: Master 8 Ball
description:
Let's play real snooker ball pool 2017 on the real snooker board table. If you are tired of typical pool games then this is the right choice to entertain you with 3D real pool game. Play Master 8 Ball & it is totally free for snooker superstars

Game Features:
- Real 3D 8 ball physics with smooth controls of snooker stick
- 3D live snooker room with smooth 8 ball pool table
- More than 2 camera views to enjoy pro 9 ball pool game
